mapper.select: select file_id, salary_id, staff_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted, comment from salary_detail_files where file_id = #{fileId}
mapper.insert: insert into salary_detail_files(salary_id, staff_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted, comment) values (#{salaryId}, #{staffId}, #{fileType}, #{fileName}, #{minioBucket}, #{minioPath}, #{uploadTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{comment})

insert into salary_detail_files(salary_id, staff_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted, comment) values
(#{entity.salaryId}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.minioBucket}, #{entity.minioPath}, #{entity.uploadTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.comment})

insert into salary_detail_files(salary_id, staff_id, file_type, file_name, minio_bucket, minio_path, upload_time, update_time, is_deleted, comment) values
(#{entity.salaryId}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.minioBucket}, #{entity.minioPath}, #{entity.uploadTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update salary_id = values(salary_id), staff_id = values(staff_id), file_type = values(file_type), file_name = values(file_name), minio_bucket = values(minio_bucket), minio_path = values(minio_path), upload_time = values(upload_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update salary_detail_files
salary_id = #{salaryId},
staff_id = #{staffId},
file_type = #{fileType},
file_name = #{fileName},
minio_bucket = #{minioBucket},
minio_path = #{minioPath},
upload_time = #{uploadTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
comment = #{comment},
where file_id = #{fileId}
